pesticide.PPE: WPS uses: long-sleeved shirt and long pants; chemical resistant gloves made of any waterproof material such as barrier laminate, butyl rubber, nitrile rubber, neoprene rubber, natural rubber, polyethylene, polyvinylchloride (PVC) or viton (if you want more options, follow the instructions for category A on an EPA chemical-resistance category selection chart); shoes plus socks. Follow manufacturer’s instructions for cleaning/maintaining PPE; if no such instructions for washables, use detergent and hot water; keep and wash PPE separately from other laundry. Non-WPS uses: shirt and pants; gloves; shoes plus socks.
pesticide.trade_Name: Nutrite Professional Turf Fertilizer with Merit 0.2 Plus

Safety_Information.general_Info: Harmful if swallowed or absorbed through skin. Causes eye irritation. Avoid contact with skin, eyes, or clothing. Wash thoroughly with soap and water after handling.
Safety_Information.if_In_Eyes: Hold eye open and rinse slowly and gently with water for 15 - 20 minutes. Remove contact lenses, if present, after the first 5 minutes, then continue rinsing eye. Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.if_Swallowed: Call a poison control center or doctor immediately for treatment advice. Have person sip a glass of water if able to swallow. Do not induce vomiting unless told to do so by a poison control center or doctor. Do not give anything by mouth to an unconscious person.
Safety_Information.if_On_Skin: Take off contaminated clothing. Rinse skin immediately with plenty of water for 15 - 20 minutes. Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.physician_Note: No specific antidote is available. Treat the patient symptomatically.
